content: will form an icord edge which setup row 2 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front gives a neat rolled appearance it also setup row 3 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front conveniently hides where you carry your yarn up the sides when switching step 5 - work body colors repeat the following 6 row until desired length is reached note carry the non-working yarn up along the side switch to color b row 1 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front row 2 k3 p to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front switch to color a row 3 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front row 4 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front row 5 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front row 6 k to 3 before end sl3 with yarn in front end on row 5 bobble all stitches weave in ends block or not as desired abbreviations co cast on bobble bind off k knit p purl sl3 slip 3 stitches purlwise with yarn in front
